changeSet.author: thickerson
changeSet.comment: Change data type of created_date to timestamp
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE archived_dataset_file alter column date_created TYPE timestamp(6) using cast (date_created as timestamp)

changeSet.author: thickerson
changeSet.comment: Change data type of created_date back to timestamp
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE archived_dataset_file modify date_created timestamp(0)
